hero.name: Sebastián
hero.title: Multimedia Engineer
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer specialized in WordPress, Next.js and e-commerce

descriptions.illustration: Creating visual worlds that inspire and connect emotions through digital art
descriptions.development: Building exceptional web experiences with clean code and scalable architectures

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a {role} living at the intersection of art and technology. My passion is creating digital experiences that inspire and connect with people.

story.title: My Story

paragraphs.intro: My fascination with digital worlds began as a child, when video games and drawing captured my imagination. This passion led me to study {degree}, where I discovered I could fuse art with technology professionally.
paragraphs.education: During my academic training (2015-2021), I developed a solid foundation in programming with {technologies}, while exploring data structures, design patterns, and SOLID principles. This technical base allowed me to understand not just the "what" but the "how" and "why" of development.
paragraphs.evolution: My professional evolution has been a constant quest to perfect this {duality}. I started as a graphic designer and motion graphics artist, working in social media, book covers, and branding, but soon moved toward web development.
paragraphs.experience: With {years} specializing in WordPress and developing e-commerce and corporate sites, I've completed over 35 projects as an independent freelancer. Recently, my focus has expanded to modern technologies like {modern_tech} in development.
paragraphs.current: Currently, I'm exploring a new creative facet: {writing}. I want to create fragments of small stories accompanied by my illustrations, combining visual and textual narrative in a complete multimedia experience.

story.modern_tech: Next.js, Astro, Flutter and AI integration

university.title: Multimedia Engineering
university.description: Comprehensive training in web development, UX/UI design and multimedia technologies. Solid foundation in programming with C++, Java, JavaScript and PHP.

diploma.title: Web Application Development Diploma
diploma.description: Intensive 6-month specialization in modern web technologies, Node.js and React Native for application development.

evolution.title: Professional Evolution
evolution.description: Transition from multimedia designer to fullstack developer. Mastery of WordPress, Next.js, Astro and modern technologies.

current.title: Multimedia Engineer
current.description: Consolidation as an independent specialist in projects that fuse creativity and technology, with national and international clients.
